article.description: — Ezra Manjon had 23 points as UC Davis defeated Idaho State 70-61 on Saturday.
article.headline: Manjon, Pepper, carry UC Davis past Idaho St.
article.linkText: Manjon, Pepper, carry UC Davis past Idaho St.
article.story: SANTA CLARA, Calif. -- — Ezra Manjon had 23 points as UC Davis defeated Idaho State 70-61 on Saturday. Elijah Pepper had 13 points and six rebounds for UC Davis (1-2). Caleb Fuller added 12 points. Tarik Cool had 18 points and six rebounds for the Bengals (0-3). Malik Porter added 14 points and 10 rebounds. Robert Ford III had 12 points and seven rebounds. ------ For more AP college basketball coverage: https://apnews.com/Collegebasketball and http://twitter.com/AP--Top25 ------ This was generated by Automated Insights, http://www.automatedinsights.com/ap, using data from STATS LLC, https://www.stats.com
